channel.title: Comments for page "Trick or Treating"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Trick or Treating"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
So what's still obsolete about this one? It looks like it was fully updated to the current state. I also noticed that the 'collect' tag got removed from all of the 'collect' pages.

It seems like they got all repurposed from the earlier quest version, but not 'fully', for whatever reason. If these are obsolete, then the information on the current stuff needs to be somewhere. But if this is the current information, then it's not really obsolete.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
So did everybody just ignore the huge "THIS PAGE IS OUTDATED AND THUS WORTHLESS" Banner?

Ingredient Hunting isn't a quest, it's a Village option, and you can get Candy any day in October.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Yeah, I'm not using the filler themes, I haven't even unlocked those yet. But I was given the selection to ingredient collect by trick-or-treating anyways.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I found that when you use the 3 themes (or now since it's october) that it works for everyday in october. this is my observation and may not be true.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: It's only october 1st, and I'm able to do itâ€¦
